channel.title: website | Qing-Zeng Zhu | 朱庆增
channel.copyright: ©Qing-Zeng, 2020. This website is built with [blogdown](https://github.com/rstudio/blogdown) and [Academic theme](https://wowchemy.com/) of [Hugo](https://gohugo.io/).

item.title: Creating a website
item.description:
This is my first time to create a website with the help of R package blogdown and Hugo. It was not as hard as I have imagined in the beginning, but as time going on, I found it necessary to know a little bit about all the underlying technologies like HTML, CSS, Hugo templating language, and JavaScript. I will keep updating if I am making a progress and keep in touch!

Be strong like a big tree
